seo: 泛微E-Office,文件上传漏洞,CNVD-2021-49104,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测泛微E-Office系统是否存在CNVD-2021-49104文件上传漏洞，通过模拟上传恶意文件并验证服务器响应来确认漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Fanwei E-Office system has the CNVD-2021-49104 file upload vulnerability. It confirms the existence of the vulnerability by simulating the upload of a malicious file and verifying the server's response.
